name: Stone Pickaxe
description:
## Stone Pickaxe

A tool used to mine iron. It is burnt after use.

You can craft a stone pickaxe at the Blacksmith in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

- 2 SFL
- 3 Wood
- 3 Stone

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/player-guides/resource-gathering#tools)
